short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saves default logins and fills in fields on ebank page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Initially I created it for my personal needs, and later on decided to extend it as a proof of concept for more like portfolio reasons. However it works just fine.

This extension simply saves bank login credential together with other Chrome settings.

Credentials are saved ONLY in your browser, they are not send anywhere else.

Before using extension, please evaluate potential risks.

No more repetitive manual data entering. Saved credentials can be automatically filled in after bank page loads. Or it can be selected which credentials needs be filled in from extension window if there are multiple single bank logins.

Currently this extension works with SEB bank, Swedbank and Luminor in Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia.
